name: Spice Box
author: Spicethemes

sections.description:
This plugin is the for SpicePress themes. It creates the slider section , service section, portfolio section and testimonial on home page in the Spicepress theme.
Spice Box is a plugin build to enhance the functionality of WordPress Theme made by Spicethemes.
This plugin create repeater controls in the customizer settings allowing you to create a live site without moving out to customizer screen. Right now plugin have a support for Spicepress WordPress Theme. In future this plugin will support other themes by Spicethemes.

External resources

Alpha color picker Control:
Copyright: (c) 2016 Codeinwp cristian-ungureanu
License: MIT License
Source: https://github.com/Codeinwp/customizer-controls/tree/master/customizer-alpha-color-picker

Repeater Control:
Copyright: (c) 2016 Codeinwp cristian-ungureanu
License: MIT license
Source: https://github.com/Codeinwp/customizer-controls/tree/master/customizer-repeater

Custom control – Image Radio Button Custom Control
Copyright: Anthony Hortin
License: GNU General Public License v2 or later
Source: https://github.com/maddisondesigns/customizer-custom-controls

sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First version of the plugin.

0.2

  • Changed plugin name spice box to spicebox.

0.2.1

  • Fixed plugin review issue.

0.2.2

  • String update

0.2.3

  • Added Theme Name

0.2.4

  • Added Theme Name

0.2.5

  • Added Theme Name
  • Added Overlay setting for slider and testimonial.

0.2.6

  • Added Child Theme Name

0.2.7

  • Added feedback popup form.

0.2.8

  • Added some more field in feedback form.
  • Style Feedback form.

0.2.9

  • Created theme inner pages.

0.3

  • Disable spicepress theme feedback popup form for security reasons.

0.3.1

  1. Added Child theme functionality.

0.3.2

  1. Remove Dobule backslah from images.

0.3.3

  1. Added Innofit theme functionality.
  2. Added Child theme name.

0.3.4

  1. Fixed testimonial markup issue.

0.3.5

  1. Added Innofit Plus functionality.

0.3.6

  1. Remove HTML markup from translate string in default data.

0.3.7

  1. Fixed service image issue.

0.3.8

  1. Added documentation link in customizer to spicepress theme.

0.3.9

  1. Fixed service image issue in spicepress.

0.3.9.1

  1. Fixed menu create issue in innofit.

0.3.9.2

  1. Added Innofit plus feature link in customizer section.

0.4

0.5

  1. Add Meta Box Feature of slider setting for chilly theme

0.6

  1. Update version.

0.7

  1. Add Limit in innofit theme for service section
  2. Add Limit in innofit theme for team section
  3. Remove Testimonial section from innofit theme
  4. Remove CTA section from innofit theme
  5. Remove subscribe section from innofit theme

1.0

  1. Update version.

1.0.1

  1. Service Icon issue fix

1.0.2

  1. Version Change

1.0.3

  1. Added Custom Feedback Form

1.0.4

  1. Added Child theme name

1.0.5

  1. Fix Page Editor unexpeccted error due to Jotform Js Confliction

1.1

  1. Added Honeypress theme functionality.

1.1.1

  1. Minor Update.

1.1.2

  1. Added SpicePress child theme name.

1.1.3

  1. Added Feedback Form for innofit theme.

1.1.4

  1. spicebox plugin issue with chilly theme fixed.

1.1.5

  1. Added HoneyPress child theme name.

1.1.6

  1. Added HoneyPress Pro link.
  2. Modify code in service section

1.2

  1. Added Cloudpress theme code.

1.2.1

  1. Added Cloudpress child theme name.
  2. Updated pot file.

1.2.2

  1. Lock icons removed for the Innofit theme.
  2. Upgrade to Plus buttom removed from the customizer settings.

1.2.3

  1. Changed sidebar widget area id for the Innofit theme.

1.2.4

  1. Changed sidebar widget area id for the Spicepress theme.
  2. Removed Read More button.

1.2.5

  1. Added Testimonial Background Color settings for the Honeypress theme.

1.2.6

  1. Added Custom controls.

1.2.7

  1. Fixed Banner issue for Chilly theme.

1.2.8

Fixed jQuery compatibiltiy issue coming with latest release on WP 5.5

1.2.9

Added variations for HoneyPress child themes.

1.3.0

Fixed minor issues of HoneyPress child themes.

1.3.1

  1. Added variations ( testimonial & service ) for Stacy Child theme.
  2. Dummy content updated for spicepress theme.

1.3.2

  1. Added variations for HoneyBee child theme.
  2. Fixed repeater checkbox issue.

1.3.3

  1. Added variations for CloudPress Agency theme.
  2. Dummy content updated for cloudpres theme.

1.3.4

  1. Added variations for the CloudPress Business theme.

1.3.5

  1. Added Slider Content Alignment Setting .

1.4.2

  1. Added Video option for slider background for the Honeypress themes.
  2. Added variations for the Honeypress Dark child theme.

1.4.3

  1. Added Team Section for the CloudPress theme.
  2. Fixed the Slider title issue of Innofit theme.

1.5

  1. Added homepage sections for BusiCare theme.

1.6

  1. Added homepage sections for Spice Software theme.

1.7

  1. Added homepage sections for Busicare Dark child theme.
  2. Added homepage sections for CloudPress Dark child theme.

1.8

  1. Added homepage sections for SpicePress Dark child theme.
  2. Added homepage sections for Spice Software Dark child theme.
  3. Compressed all images and removed the unnecessary images.
  4. Fixed container setting issue with video slider in HoneyPress theme.

1.9

  1. Added homepage sections for Spiko theme.
  2. Added homepage sections for Spiko Dark child theme.

2.0

  1. Added homepage sections for WPKites theme.
  2. Fixed the issues with PHP 8.

2.1

  1. Added homepage sections for WPHester theme.
  2. Added homepage sections for WPBlack theme.

2.1.1

  1. Fixed enqueue script url issues.

2.1.2

  1. Added freemius directory.

2.1.3

  1. Added premium starter sites and extensions menus for the wpkites theme.

2.1.4

  1. Added spice post slider shortcode field for spicepress.

2.2

  1. Updated font-awesome library and freemius directory.
  2. Updated font-awesome library For SpicePress,Honeypress,Cloudpress,Spice software,Wpkites,Wphester,Spiko Themes

2.3.1

  1. Updated font-awesome library for innofit theme.

Spice Box is a plugin build to enhance the functionality of WordPress Theme made by Spicethemes.
